full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` KHUNGS BTZAN PA'I GRIL SEL DAG BYED BDUD RTZI'I SNYING PO MKHAN PO BHI DHI SATVAS MDZAD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (ZHES YUNGS DKAR GYIS BRAB CING YI DAM GYI SNGAGS KYI GSHAM BUR SUMBHA NI DRAG TU BRJOD PAS BSKRANG BLUD RGYANG RING POR BSKYAL, PHYI MIG LHA BAR 'ONG, YID CHIS SHING KHRUNGS BTZUN PA'I GRIB SEL MKHAN PO BHO DHI SATVAS MDZAD PA'I 'DI'I DGE BAS BDAG GZHAN SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI GRIB BYANG ZHING DAG PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
